block.p: National League ATLANTA BRAVES--Signed 3B Chipper Jones to a six-year contract extension. HOUSTON ASTROS--Placed RHP Jay Powell on the 15-disabled list. Recalled RHP Jason Green from New Orleans of the PCL.

National League ATLANTA BRAVES--Signed 3B Chipper Jones to a six-year contract extension. HOUSTON ASTROS--Placed RHP Jay Powell on the 15-disabled list. Recalled RHP Jason Green from New Orleans of the PCL.
Atlantic League NASHUA PRIDE--Signed INF Deuk In Ha.
Northern League NEW JERSEY JACKALS--Placed C Drue James on the 7-day disabled list. Activated manager-DH Kash Beauchamp.

National Football League DALLAS COWBOYS--Signed TE Tyji Armstrong. INDIANAPOLIS COLTS--Placed DB Rodregis Brooks on injured reserve. MIAMI DOLPHINS--Signed QB Gus Ornstein. NEW ENGLAND PATRIOTS--Announced the retirement of LB Chad Cascadden. Signed DB Rodney Rideau. ST. LOUIS RAMS--Waived RB Derek Loville.
National Hockey League DETROIT RED WINGS--Traded RW Kent McDonell to Columbus for a 2003 sixth-round draft pick. TAMPA BAY LIGHTNING--Signed D Bryan Muir and D Kaspars Astashenko.

BRIGHAM YOUNG--Announced the retirement of LaVell Edwards, football coach, after the 2000 season. CALIFORNIA, PA.--Named Jon Bolen, David Commesso, Travis Everhart and Jason Ranone assistant football coaches. CHARLOTTE--Announced the resignation of Penny Brawley, men's tennis coach. CLEMSON--Named Leslie Hasselbach diving coach and Jim McGinnis assistant swimming coach. CONNECTICUT--Signed Geno Auriemma, women's basketball coach, through the 2004-2005 season. DAYTON--Signed Oliver Purnell, men's basketball coach, to a three-year contract extension, through the 2004-05 season. DREXEL--Named Jason Crews and Zeke Mitchem assistant baseball coaches. METRO STATE--named Andy Lehner athletic business manager and men's and women's swimming coach. MISSISSIPPI STATE--Named Steve Dudley men's assistant track coach. OHIO UNIVERSITY--Named Les Szabo women's assistant soccer coach. PRINCETON--Named Kirsty Hale assistant field hockey coach. RAMAPO--Named Kim Kramer associate athletic trainer. RPI--Named Marc Bourque, Carl Hatfield, Kevin Toye, Tim Jordain and Rob Taylor assistant football coaches. STEVENS TECH--Named Maria Castro women's volleyball coach. WESTERN KENTUCKY--Announced S Bobby Sippio has been suspended from the football team indefinitely. YOUNGSTOWN STATE--Named Trevor Parks sports information director.
